name: MR Singapore Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an online property management platform intended to rent out fully furnished apartments to corporate. The company's online property management platform offers relocation and furnished corporate accommodation located near transport amenities like MRT stations and bus stops, enabling companies to book online within the business districts, city fringe, and other parts of Singapore.
one_liner: Developer of an online property management platform intended to rent out fully furnished apartments to corporate. The company's online property management platform offers relocation and furnished corporate accommodation located near transport amenities like MRT stations and bus stops, enabling companies to book online within the business districts, city fringe, and other parts of Singapore.
